block.p: Dorcas Wright Gardner, a vice president of production at Paramount Pictures in Los Angeles, was married yesterday on Martha's Vineyard to Jonathan Boris Berg, the owner of Berg-Saccani Entertainment, a film production company in Los Angeles. The Rev. Dr. Frank M. McClain, an Episcopal priest, performed the ceremony at the Old Agricultural Hall in West Tisbury, Mass.

The bride, 32, is known as Dede and is keeping her surname. She graduated cum laude from Columbia. She is a daughter of Dorothy and John Gardner of Winnetka, Ill. Her father is a partner in William Blair & Company, the Chicago investment bank. Her mother is the president of the Michael Reese Health Trust, a nonprofit foundation in Chicago.
